roleset.name: not want to

example.name: the one example
example.text: Analysts viewed the chairman's comments as an indication that the central bank is disinclined to ease monetary policy further in the near future.
example.arg: to ease monetary policy further in the near future.

roleset.note: DISINCLINE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disincline' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, hardly even a verb. Comparison with 'incline'. (from disincline.01-v predicate notes)
